info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:32PM EDT until June 07 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 831 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adams Run, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Johns Island, West Ashley, Hollywood, Ravenel, Seabrook Island, Kiawah Island, Meggett, Rockville, Jacksonboro, Bears Bluff, Wadmalaw Island, Yonges Island, and Adams Run. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
